Title: A new annulate Pluteus from Italy
Keywords:
Basidiomycota, Agaricomycetes, Agaricales, Pluteaceae,
Chamaeota, taxonomy
Abstract:
An infraspecific taxon of Pluteus aurantiorugosus, var.
aurantiovelatus var. nov., is described from Italy based upon both
morphological and ITS rDNA data. This taxon is characterized by an
ornamented stipe provided with reddish orange remnants of a partial
veil.
